mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address ( owner_type, user_id, postal, address, detail_address, nickname, create_user, main_address ) VALUES ( #{ownerType}, #{userId}, #{postal}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{nickname}, #{createUser}, #{mainAddress} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId ,address_no AS addressNo ,postal ,address ,detail_address AS detailAddress ,nickname AS nickname ,main_address AS mainAddress FROM address WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND main_address = 'Y'
